definition: A hard, rigid structure found in the body of certain animals, typically used for support, protection, and movement. It is commonly used in cooking and as a source of nutrients.

examples.german: Der Hund nagt an einem Knochen.
examples.english: The dog is gnawing on a bone.

examples.german: Sie hat sich den Knochen gebrochen.

examples.english: Bone marrow is rich in nutrients.

examples.german: Der Archäologe fand ein altes Knochenfragment.
examples.english: The archaeologist found an ancient bone fragment.
The chicken soup contains bone broth.
